title: Dinnerbone：玩家列表将有重大改动！
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-5-16 18:31 编辑 




@Dinnerbone
The tab-list in Minecraft also now groups together teams and sorts players by name. This should make team events a little easier to play! :)
现在Minecraft的玩家列表将会还按组别和名字排序名字次序。这应该会使团队活动更容易玩！:)
